entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is introduced as a character who can see through Invisibility Cloaks and has a magical eye that can travel over people.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is introduced as a character who is wearing a nightshirt and is being questioned by Moody about someone breaking into his office.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the person who is trapped in the stairs behind Snape and Filch, and is seen by Moody through his Invisibility Cloak.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is introduced as a character who is clutching an egg.

relationships.description: Moody questions Snape about someone breaking into his office.
Moody sees Harry through his Invisibility Cloak.
Snape is associated with Filch, who is clutching an egg.
